head.title: Billowing Jewelry To Take the Edge Off

hedline.hl1: Billowing Jewelry To Take the Edge Off

abstract.p: Chimaera, sterling silver jewelry shop, opens on East Seventh Street in Manhattan (New Yorkers & Co column) (S)

block.p: A small sterling silver jewelry shop, Chimaera, opened on Oct. 12 at 117 East Seventh Street (between First Avenue and Avenue A). The store's free-form jewelry is designed by the store's owner, Robin Morris. It is inspired by Ms. Morris's life experiences, she said, even though she lives in the hard-edged landscape of New York City. ''My jewelry is very organic, it's very asymmetrical,'' she said. One design used in both a ring ($65) and a bracelet ($220) is called Gate, and Ms. Morris said it was inspired by wrought iron gates she noticed in front of brownstones in the Village and the Upper West Side.
